name: Network Down
description:
The networks are down and must be repaired. Unfortunately it's a legacy network and they are complicated beasts. Use long wires and the quality gets degraded. Let the wires cross each other and you introduce crosstalk. Can you fix the networks while keeping these at a minimum? And don't forget, your work performance is being monitored. Don't spend too much time making the fixes - a lot needs to be done.

How To Play :
* Click in any cell to place a wire
* Wires cannot cross grey cells
* Nodes can be connected in any order

Credits :
Abhishek Agarwal
Ujwal Kumar
